loan.name: Eduard
loan.use: to buy compost to be used in the fair-trade, organic coffee fields.
loan.description:
Eduard lives in the town of El Faique with his wife. He is 27 years old. Eduard works in a variety of areas, be it providing harvesting and drying services of coffee, with the support of his wife, Olga, who also works as a farmer, or making some extra income raising small farm animals for private consumption. Eduard needs to keep composting and growing more coffee plants in the town of El Faique – San José de Lourdes and he hopes one day he can use the earning to fix his home and improve his family's living conditions.
This loan will allow Eduard to have the chance to increase his coffee production in his farm, not only ensuring he will have a job, but also giving him the chance to plan for the growth of his family and to live in better financial conditions some day as well.
loan.whySpecial: It supports lucrative and sustainable livelihoods for organic farmers.
loan.partnerName: Cooperativa de Ahorro y Crédito Norandino
